code: import React,{useState}from"react";import'./Footer.css';import home from'../assets/homeicon.svg';import exit from'../assets/exitacc.svg';import attention from'../assets/attention.svg';import history from'../assets/history.svg';import{Navigate,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Footer(){const navigate=useNavigate();function handleSubmit(){localStorage.removeItem('user');navigate('/');}function handleSubmit2(path){navigate(path);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:'nav-bar',style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-around'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleSubmit2(''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:'icons-menu',src:home,alt:'home'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleSubmit2('history'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:'icons-menu',src:history,alt:'home'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleSubmit(),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:'icons-menu',src:exit,alt:'home'})})]});}export default Footer;
